member.name: P:InactivityBot.ApplicationSettings.Database
member.summary: Gets or sets the database connection configuration.

member.name: T:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings
member.summary: The configuration settings for a mongo db database.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the database connection host.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the database connection port.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.DatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the database.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.UsesAuthentication
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the database requires authentication.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.AuthenticationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication type.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.UserName
member.summary: Gets or sets the username for authentication.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the user password for authentication.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.AllowInsecureTls
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether insecure TLS connections are allowed.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.UseTls
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether TLS should be enabled.

member.name: P:InactivityBot.DatabaseSettings.AuthenticationDatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication database name.

member.name: M:InactivityBot.Mongo.MongoManager.GetDtoType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the DTO type from the expected assembly, if it is not marked with the then we return null
member.param: The type requested from the client.
member.returns: If the dto exists and is marked with the expected attribute, the type is returned. Otherwise the value will be null.
